data.title: U.S. and China agree on Korean denuclearization
A passenger plane carrying more than 100 people has crashed into the ocean off the coast of Bali - It is believed that everyone on board has survived.
An Indian village plants 111 trees for every girl born.
Margaret Thatcher: Respect for the dead is an outdated and foolish principle - Let us say what we think, and be frank about it: death does not confer privilege
Outrage in Spain over video game that depicts Pope Benedict XVI as pimp for pedophile cardinals
[Philippines] Manila offers US its military bases in case of N Korea war
A tribe of dreadlocked pygmies, measuring less than half a meter tall, are spotted emerging from the Indonesian rainforest for the first time.

Mayan Genocide - Former Guatemalan dictator Efrain Rios Montt, accused of ordering the execution of over 1,700 indigenous Ixil Mayans in 1980s, on trial. It's "the 1st time anywhere in the world" a former head of state is tried for genocide by a national tribunal.
UK 'confirms' use of chemical weapons in Syria after secret MI6 op – report
